Testimonials

Ginny Lengel - TurfTide Newfoundlands

Love, love, love this grooming table top! The gorgeous shot, taken by Klinefelter's Gallery, of a very special Newf litter of mine, always brings praise and inquires at dog shows. Yes, it was super easy to apply; yes, it has proven to be quite durable; yes, any picture you want can be put on the table; and yes, I'll be happy to tell you where you can get one of your own. An added bonus is that I don't have to worry about people accidentally walking off with my table! Thank you, Klinefelter's Gallery, for offering such a special product.

Llaria Debernardi

Oh, I love my new table! The colors are perfect and shine! The surface is okay for my dogs feet. My dogs love it too!

Livy Petsch

These table tops are great! Ours makes my mom Ashley look lovely and super-speedy too, or at least faster than your average potato.

Tina Bowers

When trying to find the perfect gift to honor Ellie, a Newfoundland who is very dear to our hearts, we decided to order a custom, photo, grooming table cover from Paul Klinefelter. We emailed a photo to him, and he touched it up and designed a table cover more beautiful than we could have imagined. When we uncovered this gift, everyone was speechless, and there was not a dry eye around. The table cover was gorgeous. It appeared to be very durable, but the owners liked it so much, I think they are using it for an end table instead of a grooming table. I will definitely be purchasing another one of these. Thanks for the perfect gift, Paul!

0

Tabletops are made of a material that I don't know, but seems to be slip-resistant. Ask Peach for more information about them.
